Posts.Content: May 20, 2009 11:41AM hopenlove314 wrote: Hi G,  I can only imagine how concerned you are.  From my recent research on breast problems their could be some other reasons other than cancer for tissue inflammation in the nipple. Have you heard of Pagets disease?  It is a rare breast cancer that is in the nipple and it is usually one side. I am concerned that I may have Pagets disease of the breast.  One my nipple constantly itches and tingles.  I recently had an ultrasound but the doctor told me not to drink any coffee or soy milk for one to two weeks.  If that doesn't help then they will probably do a biopsy! I am 32 years old and nervous about this but I trust God no matter what happens. I hope all is well with your biopsy!  Please post when you get your results! Take Care Hope
Posts.Title: Nipple/areola biopsy- spoke to Dr. GRB Polyana
